short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This package enables users to locate and store CSS Selectors to be used in conjunction with the Site Monitor in the TEX Sourcing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you are an authenticated user of the TEX Sourcing platform, then you should install this package to enhance your Site Monitoring experience.  By installing this package, you will gain access to helpful functionalities in the browser sidebar that can make locating relevant CSS selectors child’s play.  Once you’ve found the relevant selectors - assisted by our visual point & click interface - you’ll be able to send that data to TEX to start monitoring!
